content.text:
# List of vice presidents of the Republic of China__disambig_1

}}
: To avoid confusion, all the names on this list follow the Eastern order convention (family name first, given name second) for consistency.
This is a list of all the vice presidents of the Republic of China (1912–present).
{|class=wikitable
!Name!!Chinese!!MandarinPinyin!!TaiwanesePe̍h-ōe-jī!!HakkaPha̍k-fa-sṳ
|-
|Vice President||align=center|}}||Fùzǒngtǒng||Hù-chóng-thóng||Fu-chúng-thúng
|}
